description: Part two, part single storey rear extension; and single storey side extension (following demolition of existing rear extension)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site location plan; SK01-01 P2 (Existing site plan); SK01 P3 (Existing ground floor plan); SK02 P2 (Existing first floor and loft plan); SK02 P4 (Existing and approved first floor and loft plan); SK03 P4 (Existing and approved elevations); SK03 P5 (Existing elevations); SK04 P6 (Proposed ground floor); SK05 P7 (Proposed first floor plan); SK05-1 P2 (Proposed second floor plan); SK06 P6 (Proposed front and rear elevations); SK07 P6 (Proposed south side elevation); SK12 P3 (Proposed section AA); SK13 P3 (Proposed section BB) (final revisions received 22.04.2021)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2016 (as amended) (or any subsequent amendment or new Order), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 7.B of the Development Management, Development Plan Document (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policy D4 of the London Plan (2021); and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| The side elevation windows on the first and second floors hereby approved shall be obscure-glazed and fixed shut, unless the opening part of the window is at least 1.7m above the floor level of the room it serves.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
